allowClear.description: Allows you to clear the selected color

:arrow.description: Configure the arrows that pop up

:defaultValue.description: The default value for the color

destroyTooltipOnHide.description: Whether to destroy the pop-up window after it is closed

:mode.description: Picker mode, used to configure single color and gradient
:mode.description_zh: 选择器模式，用于配置单色与渐变

open.description: Whether or not to display a pop-up window

:presets.type: { label: ReactNode, colors: Array<string / Color>, defaultOpen?: boolean, key?: React.Key }[]

placement.description: The location of the pop-up window
placement.type: top / topLeft / topRight / bottom / bottomLeft / bottomRight

:panelRender.type: (panel: React.ReactNode, extra: { components: { Picker: FC; Presets: FC } }) => React.ReactNode

trigger.description: The trigger mode of the color picker
trigger.description_zh: 颜色选择器的触发模式

rootClassName.description: Add className to the outermost layer of component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

Color.name: toCssString
Color.description_zh: 转换成 CSS 支持的格式

Color.name: toHex
Color.description: Convert to hex format string, returns format like: 1677ff
Color.description_zh: 转换成 `hex` 格式字符，返回格式如：1677ff

Color.name: toHexString
Color.description: Convert to hex format color string, returns format like: #1677ff
Color.description_zh: 转换成 `hex` 格式颜色字符串，返回格式如：`#1677ff`

Color.name: toHsb
Color.type: () => ({ h: number, s: number, b: number, a number })

Color.name: toHsbString
Color.description: Convert to hsb format color string, returns format like: hsb(215, 91%, 100%)
Color.description_zh: 转换成 `hsb` 格式颜色字符串，返回格式如：`hsb(215, 91%, 100%)`

Color.name: toRgb
Color.type: () => ({ r: number, g: number, b: number, a number })

Color.name: toRgbString
Color.description: Convert to rgb format color string, returns format like: rgb(22, 119, 255)
Color.description_zh: 转换成 `rgb` 格式颜色字符串，返回格式如：`rgb(22, 119, 255)`

events.name: onChangeComplete
events.description: The callback for the completion of the color selection
events.description_zh: 颜色选择完成的回调，通过 onChangeComplete 对 value 受控时拖拽不会改变展示颜色

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description_zh: 当 `open` 被改变时的回调
